typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Address as string,
		Contact_BOID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ShippingTable
ChangeColumnNamesToParquetFormat alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsert
Exists1 select(mapColumn(
		Name,
		Address,
		ContactBOID = Contact_BOID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ChangeColumnNamesToParquetFormat
ShippingTable exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Upsert sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Address as string,
		Contact_BOID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
